usedToBuild: landing page with a slider, multi-language with translation, contact form, etc
text:
I'm not much about writing reviews. But this tool is top!
I created a landing page with a slider, multi-language with translation, contact form, etc, in less than 2 hours.
one of the easiest and most reliable app so far to create programs i always wanted to find something like this it does way better job that bard gpt and other ai like this keep it up guys!
That is insane! Unbelievable! :)
Really impressive. Time from idea to a usable product is faster than anything I've ever seen before. And with very few restrictions

I'm absolutely addicted to this app to the point where I'm sad when they do updates üòÇ. The team are super and there are many things GPTE can do that others can't like Github commits, Supabase configs and a lot more. Its a fantastic app and I wish the team the best.

Lovable is a potential emotional companionship app, suitable for users who need simple confession or emotional support. Its advantages lie in being available at any time, privacy protection, and personalized interactive experience

I've joined the team, so I'm biased, but I wouldn't have joined if I didn't think it was awesome!

Really cool that it enables building so many different kind of web apps so easily. It's frankly impressive already, with lots of upcoming improvements to make it even more so!
This tool is a lifesaver for quick web app deployment! üí° Already saving time and making the process smoother. Do you have plan to extended it as VS plugin?

It starts out really well, but as you get to more complicated tasks, it tends to fail but also fails on simple tasks like integrating Supabase authentication... can't handle catching simple missing email/password error and show an alert to the user, it'll get stuck in a loop and never fix the actual issue. Discord "community" was no help, I was mocked for wasting hundreds of messages on trying to fix the issues.
Average experienceÔºåInterface to be optimized

Great for many things but it needs to have make more isolated changes and not change random things when making updates. Working with the backend and trying to doing event tracking is a nightmare - what a mess.

It made something pretty nice in a very short time from one prompt, so I am really impressed. Making changes is still a challenge for me to find the right prompts and to get the wanted results, but I think after a bit of practice I will get better at that to avoid it getting confused and erroring. We are just getting to know each other, so learn to communicatie is step 1üòä
GPT Engineer was the first AI based coding tool that successfully created a cloaking script with all necessary files around it, that i ran with Google ads.. succesfully! haha good job

The best piece of software ever made! I am finally able to build my ideas and not just dream about them. As someone who never wrote code in his life, feeling the power of seeing how an MVP can come to life in 2h or less is mind boggling to me! And the team behind the project is great too, very supportive, very responsive, all in all an amazing project.
So far the public project has been great at building out projects quickly. I have great expectations of what the commercial product will be capable of.
Super cool stuff. Keep rocking.
Running a trial right now. Awesome for rapid prototype. Maybe more.
Excellent app builder. Making our (no code experience) life so much easier
It's going in the right code direction :-)

Wow  !!!
AI is now really hitting home. This is a practical and time-saving deployment and use of AI. I've already saved so much time on mock-ups and getting code that is almost production ready.
Great work Anton and team!!!
Excellent product with a beautiful design.
It's nice. I think they need more sponsors too
THE BEST AI WEBSITE BUILDER.

Great tool! 
Been working on my challenge to generate an idea every day for the year 2024! 
Since I've been working on Lovable (for 2 weeks now), I was able to prototype 15 ideas and get an MVP running in less than 1 hour per idea. 
For a non-developer like me, it's a breakthrough!

An honest opinion after signing up for the starter plan...

I spent most of my credits trying to fix things.  I went round and round trying to correct them.

The app has good potential, but it needs a lot of work right now.

It's not there yet and I don't understand why all the credits someone pays for should go towards fixing things.

If you need a simple app, this could work...if you don't dive too deep into the output.

I've noticed it works well on the surface but not good when it comes to actually performing.

I have faith that eventually it will come around. Right now it's not there.

My honest opinion and I'm not paid or have an issue with anyone on the matter.

At the begging it is faster, it carry code real quick but when there will be some extra functionality included it lack of fix. It keep giving errors. And finally it finished the Limit.

It stuck in errors no fix. Multiple tried with different keywords and prompt never worked.
Very friendly for people who don't know how to code and beautifully designed. Highly recommended!

Lovable.dev is an absolute powerhouse! From the moment I started using it, I was blown away by its intuitive design and how effortlessly it integrates into my workflow. The platform doesn‚Äôt just simplify tasks; it supercharges them. Whether you‚Äôre an individual developer or part of a team, Lovable.dev empowers you to create, collaborate, and innovate at lightning speed.

The tools are incredibly powerful, yet surprisingly easy to use, making it perfect for both beginners and seasoned professionals. The attention to detail and user-centric approach are evident in every feature, ensuring you spend less time troubleshooting and more time doing what you love‚Äîbuilding amazing things!

Lovable.dev has redefined what‚Äôs possible for me as a developer, and I can‚Äôt imagine going back to life without it. Highly recommend it to anyone looking to level up their development game. Five stars just don‚Äôt seem enough for how transformative this platform truly is!

This is such a great way to enable people with ideas and little to no coding skills to create. It still definitely helps to know something about programming, just to recognize the mistakes that you or Lovable made and be able to supply proper feedback to fix it. 
As with all A.I. Lovable sometimes get stuck in a loop of making the same mistake or creating new bugs when fixing other bugs. That, and it sometimes being too hasty with applying solutions makes me really wanna beg the Lovable team for more credits - A rough estimation is that 20-30% of my credits get spend because I have to fix lovable's mistakes. ‚Äì other than that I love it!

I have tried almost all AI-powered developer tools, and this one stands above the rest. It delivers code with very high precision and rarely breaks. It truly understands even the weakest prompts, and its seamless integration with Supabase is impressive. I am genuinely curious about what is running behind the scenes. The downside for me is not offering credit/token base, it only offers subscription. Keep up the excellent work!
